name: Rosie Quest
description:
It's my first major project in unity but I have an okay programming background so I wasn't starting completely from scratch - that said, I'm no pro, so there might be a little jank! Personally I think it's plenty playable, but who knows. It's very much in the spirit of older super nintendo platformers.

It plays similar to mario world, but obviously with the controls feeling a little different. My level design style is inspired by the donkey kong country games in that I tried to make every level have some kind of unique hook to it. There's a good chunk of gimmick levels, but also I try to have each level have its own focus to make it stand out from the rest. There are 62 levels in the game, including postgame special world content.

Here's a little demo video
